A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Shame on the professional critics who rated this movie highly. The influence from Disney on the reviews listed here is obvious. Character development\, plot continuity\, or even a grade school understanding of physics are all noticeably absent from this sad excuse of a movie. This poorly written and soulless cash grab concerns itself more with providing a backdrop for the selling of merchandise than it does with the telling of a clear narrative. The visual effects are terrific\, but no amount of flashing lightsabers or exhausted John Williams can spare it from the mortal wound that is bad writing.
